name: Green Fruit Crush II
description:
Green Fruit Crush II is one of the best match-3 games you'll ever find in the market today! Match three or more of the sweet Fruits diamonds as fast as possible and be the Fruits champion! connect lines of fruit to compete challenging levels in this puzzle adventure. Get ready to be introduced to a wonderful garden
features:
● Surprises for you in each level
● Over 500 levels for you to challenge. More levels coming soon!
● Lovely graphics and powerful boosters!
● Gold coins and silvers can be Free got to help you pass levels
